title: Quick Poll: League Game Experience
body: Please take this quick poll regarding your League experience.  I hope to submit the results for helpful feedback.

replies.body: ... I have no idea what any of the options mean.

1. are you good and your team is good?
2. Is your team good, but you're bad?
3. Is your team bad, but you're good?
4. Are you bad and your team just as bad?


hope that makes it easier to understand. lol
Slightly, but the answer to all of those questions vary game to game. I've hit all 4 options this season, what would I be expected to answer?
it's however you feel happens the most throughout your history playing the game. what happens the most often or your feel happens most often.
This poll has nothing to do with expierence, all it is, is a "bad or good" team. Also, it has no middle ground
Good point.  What I was trying to aim for was overall satisfaction.  Are players more upset with their teams or their own personal play.
